org.kepler.stratosphere.director

Class StratosphereEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.ddp.director.DDPEngine
      • org.kepler.stratosphere.director.StratosphereEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class StratosphereEngine
extends DDPEngine
    An engine than runs workflows in Stratosphere. This engine converts DDP pattern actors (Map, Reduce, Cross, CoGroup, and Match) and I/O actors (DDPDataSink and DDPDataSource) into a Stratosphere job and runs it on the server.

    NOTE: Only DDP pattern and I/O actors may be present in the workflow. Other actors must placed inside the composite pattern actors or in a different sub-workflow.

    Author:
    Daniel Crawl
